title: For Dussehra This Year, Ravana Donned The Avengers Avatar & It's The Best Crossover Ever!
text:
For Dussehra This Year, Ravana Donned The Avengers Avatar & It's The Best Crossover Ever!

For Dussehra This Year, Ravana Donned The Avengers Avatar & It's The Best Crossover Ever!

Themed pandals and Ravana effigies are major crowd-pullers and this year, organisers kept in mind the biggest highlights of the year. They had a wide variety of themes - from paying homage to soldiers killed in the Pulwama attack, to a tribute to the Avengers: Endgame.

Reddit

While one Ravana effigy was seen carrying Captain America's shield as he went up in flames, there was another one dressed as Thanos. Let's face it, it's possibly the best crossover ever!

While the location of the Ravana carrying Captain America's shield is not clear, the one with Thanos was erected and burned down in Delhi's Karampura area.

The comments on Reddit couldn't stop comparing the effigy to the Endgame, one user wrote, 'Someone tell Thor not to aim for the head,' another wrote, 'It's legit interesting how Marvel grew out of movies in India instead of the comic books, like goddamn when Disney starts owning countries Marvel fans will just submit themselves'.

Someone actually had a very interesting theory: 'A plot twist at MCU, RAAVAN is the brother of Thanos and he is going to take revenge for his brother's death in next MCU phase'.

The festival is marked as Dussehra in the north, Dasara in the south, Vijayadashami in east and north eastern states of India.

Reddit

Since the festival marks the victory of good over evil, themes have ore often than not struck on social evils. For instance, in 2017 in UP's Aishbagh Ramleela Maidan, the Ravan effigy celebrating the Beti Bachao, Beto Padhao abhiyaan. The 121 feet Raavan effigy had Female Foeticide and Tushtikaran as the theme.

In this years Aishbagh Ramleela Maidan, one of the effigies represented Pakistan sponsored terrorism and the other pollution caused by plastic, reports TOI.

Dussehra festivities begin with 10-day Ram Lila, theatrical representation of Ramayana, that is organised at various places across the country by theatre artists.

The Red Fort Ground is the location for one of the most prestigious Ravan Dahan events, in all of India. On Dussehra, Lav Kush Ramlila Committee has been setting up the Ravan Dahan at Red Fort since the 1970.
